name.jp: ゴーストエフェクト(10分)

description.en: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.ar: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.br: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.cns: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.de: Eine gespenstische Geisteraura erscheint auf deinem Charakter. Hält 10 Minuten an. Sie kann akkumuliert werden, um ihre Dauer zu verlängern.
description.fi: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.fil: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.fr: Une aura de fantôme effrayant apparaîtra sur votre personnage. Dure 10 minutes et peut être cumulé pour augmenter la durée.
description.id: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.it: A spooky Ghost aura will appear on your character. Lasts 10 minutes. It can be accumulated to increase its duration.
description.jp: 不気味なゴーストオーラがキャラクターに現れます。所要時間は10分。蓄積することで持続時間を延ばすことができます。

description.sp: Un Aura fantasmal espeluznante aparecerá en tu personaje.. Dura 10 minutos. Se puede acumular su duración.
